definition: top scorer in the palace examination (highest rank of the Imperial examination system)/see 榜眼[bang3 yan3] and 探花[tan4 hua1]/top scorer in college entrance examination 高考[gao1 kao3]/(fig.) the most brilliantly talented person in the field/leading light
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
lit. in every trade, a master appears (idiom); fig. You can produce outstanding achievements in any task, provided you put it enough love and diligence

sentences.english: Griffin is the first No. 1 overall selection out of Oklahoma in school history.
sentences.chinese: 格里芬是Oklahoma大學歷史上的第一個狀元。

sentences.english: Mid-2001 exam, our school won the urban areas, students sail Kaozhuang Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 2001年中考，我校揚帆同學奪得了市區中考狀元。

sentences.english: Can the Best Performers in Exams to Colleges Become Good Executives?
sentences.chinese: 高考狀元能成爲優秀經理人嗎？

sentences.english: There are many sorts of hero, and most of us have more than one skill.
sentences.chinese: 行行出狀元，我們大多數人都不只擁有一種技能。

sentences.english: The tea dance champion south window, given in church.
sentences.chinese: 紅袖舞南窗，狀元賜朝堂。

sentences.english: He was the top overall pick by the Rockets in the 2002 draft.
sentences.chinese: 他是火箭隊在2002年選中的狀元秀。

sentences.english: What do you think of cheating in the college entrance exam?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎麼看待高考狀元造假的呢？

sentences.english: Also known as the absolutely horrendous first overall pick by MJ when he was GM for the Wizards.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道布朗是喬丹當奇才總經理時選的水貨狀元。

sentences.english: The Zhuangyuan Lou restaurant is located on Niutou Hill near Dongdu.
sentences.chinese: 狀元樓食府是一家有着濃郁福建特色的文化餐廳。

sentences.english: No. 1 Scholar ZHANG Xie is the earliest playwright we can find up to now.
sentences.chinese: 《張協狀元》是目前所能見到的最早的南戲作品。

sentences.english: Yao was the first ever NBA No. 1 pick from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 姚明是NBA歷史上第一位非美籍的選秀狀元。

sentences.english: He criticized the media hype over the so-called zhuangyuan.
sentences.chinese: 他對媒體對於“高考狀元”的大肆宣傳進行了批評。

sentences.english: The news that a winner of the College Entrance Exam sponsored for certain underwear has aroused controversy recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近，高考狀元代言內褲的新聞引起了一陣爭議。

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
junior high school (Tw)/abbr. for 國民中學|国民中学[guo2 min2 zhong1 xue2]
